llm_res.rule: transfer: The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
transferFrom: The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
llm_res.function: transferFrom(address sender, address recipient, uint256 amount)

llm_res.rule: approve: Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
transfer should throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
